text: Thanks for sharing your idea, <@U042QF4T36G>. You'll get the most eyes from our team on it if you post it here. <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/idb-p/HubSpot_Ideas>

Yep - really like this idea.
<@UMZFZHVUJ> you're talking about those tags (first screenshot), right? Really like it. Could be used like in the second screenshot (note: I've just completely made that up - there's currently no such feature).

Since this is your idea <@U071YF9HQF3>, please post it in the <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/idb-p/HubSpot_Ideas|ideas area> of the HubSpot Community you should get the kudos for that and make sure to share the link :slightly_smiling_face: I'll be happy to share it with my network so it'll get more upvotes/visibility
<@UJAPS2K4N> you took it even further with this visualization :clap: Kudos to that!

I was just envisioning like a star or something to "pin" to the top. For example, when I was working on one page I kept going to this Logo folder in files, but I would have to scroll down and it was hard to find. Doing it over and over for a lot of logos made me wish I could pin the logo folder to top while I was working on this page. Same for the page list, I'm in and out of the same 2-3 pages at a time while working on them. I know you can filter by last update or something but I still think a pin/star would be a nice touch. I'll post something about it when I get a chance! It might also be nice to just pin the home page or other important pages that you come to a lot, even if you haven't worked on it recently.
